item.title: Differentiable Modal Synthesis for Physical Modeling of Planar String Sound and Motion Simulation
item.description: Differentiable Modal Synthesis (DMSP) achieves superior accuracy in simulating the dynamic behavior of nonlinear strings, enabling realistic sound and motion synthesis guided by physical laws.
